pages.text: $(li)The Raid Horn can be used to cancel a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Village Raid$(/l) that is in progress.$(br)$(li)Where there is no raid in progress, blowing a Raid Horn will call a $(l:patchouli:illagers/patrol)Wandering Pillager Patrol$(/l) group to spawn nearby.$(br)$(li)Patrol Leaders very rarely drop a Raid Horn upon death.
